snippet: Kevin Garnett’s pregame progression — a series of idiosyncratic acts and subtle gestures — has been calibrated and perfected over 1,455 total games.
abstract: Brooklyn Nets forward Kevin Garnett’s pregame progression, a series of idiosyncratic acts and subtle gestures, has been calibrated and perfected over 1,455 total games; procedure may betray a tendency toward obsessive behavior, and to many around Garnett, it reveals everything about his professional character.
lead_paragraph: Kevin Garnett’s pregame progression — a series of idiosyncratic acts and subtle gestures — has been calibrated and perfected over 1,455 total games.

headline.main: Garnett Has a Precise System Before He’s a ‘Go’
headline.print_headline: Garnett Has a Precise System Before He’s a ‘Go’
